customCss.title: Custom CSS
customCss.label: Enter your custom CSS here:
customCss.description: This CSS will be applied to the sources.

vdoNinjaSettings.title: VDO.Ninja Settings
vdoNinjaSettings.roomOrStreamIdsNeeded: Room Name or Stream ID(s) needed

streamIdMappings.title: Stream ID Mappings
streamIdMappings.ruleDescription: Define how incoming streams are routed to OBS scenes.

logMessages.customCssChangedWillApplyToSource: Custom CSS input changed. It will be applied directly to OBS source settings on next creation/update.
logMessages.errorLoadingSettings: Error loading settings from localStorage: {{message}}. Using defaults.
logMessages.noSavedSettings: No saved settings found. Using default values.
logMessages.appInitialized: VDO.Ninja OBS Control Dock Initialized. Welcome!
logMessages.jsShaLoaded: jsSHA library loaded successfully (fallback for Web Crypto).
logMessages.errorLoadingJsSha: Error: Failed to load jsSHA library. OBS authentication might fail if Web Crypto is also unavailable.
logMessages.errorLoadingStreamMappings: Error loading stream mappings from localStorage: {{message}}
logMessages.warningStreamMappingElementsNotFound: Warning: Could not find all expected elements in a stream mapping UI div.

vdoNinja.errorRoomOrStreamIdNeeded: VDO.Ninja Error: Room Name or Stream ID(s) must be provided.
vdoNinja.connectionTimeout: VDO.Ninja connection timed out. No activity received from iframe.
vdoNinja.roomOrStreamIdNeededForConnect: VDO.Ninja: Room Name or specific Stream ID(s) must be provided to connect.
vdoNinja.streamIdsEmptyAfterTrim: VDO.Ninja: Stream IDs provided but were empty after trimming.
vdoNinja.invalidBaseUrl: Invalid VDO.Ninja base URL in settings: {{url}}
vdoNinja.iframeConnectedActive: VDO.Ninja iframe connection established and active.
vdoNinja.streamLabelUpdated: VDO.Ninja stream label updated for ID {{id}}: "{{newLabel}}" (was "{{oldLabel}}")
vdoNinja.connectionLostResetting: VDO.Ninja connection lost (no activity from iframe). Attempting to reset.

obs.errorPrefixesRequired: Error: Camera, Reaction, and Highlight prefixes are required for OBS connection.
obs.errorUrlRequired: Error: OBS WebSocket URL is required.
obs.attemptingConnection: Attempting to connect to OBS WebSocket at {{url}}...
obs.connectionTimeout: OBS WebSocket connection attempt timed out.
obs.connectionOpenedWaitingHello: OBS WebSocket connection opened. Waiting for Server Hello...
obs.receivedHelloSendingIdentify: Received Hello from OBS. Sending Identify...
obs.authDataPrepared: Authentication data prepared for Identify message.
obs.warningAuthRequiredNoPassword: Warning: OBS server requires authentication, but no password provided.
obs.authSuccessConnected: OBS WebSocket Authentication successful! Connection established.
obs.eventSceneListChanged: OBS Event: Scene list changed. Re-fetching scenes.
obs.errorProcessingMessage: Error processing OBS WebSocket message: {{message}}. Data: {{data}}
obs.authFailedReason: Authentication Failed - incorrect password or auth required and not provided.
obs.cannotSendRequestNotConnected: Cannot send request '{{requestType}}': Not connected to OBS.
obs.connectionEstablishedFetchingData: OBS Connection fully established. Fetching initial data...
obs.initialRearrangeAutoGrid: Initial rearrange for auto-grid on main target scene after OBS connection.
obs.errorPostConnectionSetup: Error during post-OBS connection setup (fetching scenes): {{message}}
obs.connectionClosedOrLost: OBS Connection has been closed or lost.
obs.cannotFetchScenesNotConnected: Cannot fetch OBS scenes: Not connected to OBS.
obs.mainSceneNotFound: Previously selected main scene "{{sceneName}}" no longer found. Please reselect.
obs.screenShareSceneNotFound: Previously selected screen share scene "{{sceneName}}" no longer found. Defaulting to "Same as main".
obs.highlightSceneNotFound: Previously selected highlight scene "{{sceneName}}" no longer found. Please reselect.
obs.errorApplyingSavedMappings: Error applying saved scene selections to stream mappings: {{message}}
obs.failedToFetchScenes: Failed to fetch OBS scenes or no scenes returned.
obs.cannotHighlightNotConnected: Cannot highlight: Not connected to OBS.
obs.stoppingScreenShareForHighlight: A screen share is active ({{id}}). Stopping it before highlighting.
obs.studioModeSwitchHighlight: Studio Mode Enabled - Triggering scene switch to Highlight Scene: '{{sceneName}}'.
obs.switchingToHighlightScene: Triggering scene switch to Highlight Scene: '{{sceneName}}'.
obs.cannotScreenShareNotConnected: Cannot start screen share: Not connected to OBS.
obs.unhighlightingForScreenShare: A camera is highlighted ({{id}}). Unhighlighting it before starting screen share.
obs.studioModeSwitchScreenShare: Studio Mode Enabled - Triggering scene switch to Screen Share Scene: '{{sceneName}}'.
obs.switchingToScreenShareScene: Triggering scene switch to Screen Share Scene: '{{sceneName}}'.
obs.errorSwitchingScreenShareScene: Error switching to screen share scene '{{sceneName}}': {{message}}
obs.cannotAddScreenShareNotConnected: Cannot add screen share: Not connected to OBS.
obs.cannotAddScreenShareNoRoom: Cannot add screen share: VDO.Ninja Room name is required for screen sharing URLs.
obs.cannotAddScreenShareNoTargetScene: Cannot add screen share: Target OBS scene is required.
obs.addingUpdatingScreenShare: Adding/Updating screen share source '{{sourceName}}' (URL: {{url}}) to scene '{{sceneName}}'
obs.reconfiguringExistingScreenShare: Reconfiguring existing screen share source '{{oldName}}' to be '{{newName}}'.
obs.reconfiguredRenamedScreenShare: Reconfigured and renamed existing screen share source to '{{sourceName}}'.
obs.screenShareExistsUpdating: Screen share source '{{sourceName}}' already exists. Updating its settings.
obs.sourceFoundInSceneEnabled: Source '{{sourceName}}' found in scene '{{sceneName}}', item ID: {{itemId}}. Ensuring it's enabled.
obs.sourceNotFoundCreatingItem: Source '{{sourceName}}' not found as an item in scene '{{sceneName}}'. Creating scene item.
obs.createdSceneItem: Created scene item for '{{sourceName}}' in '{{sceneName}}', item ID: {{itemId}}.
obs.appliedTransformScreenShare: Applied transform to screen share source '{{sourceName}}' in '{{sceneName}}'.
obs.successConfigScreenShare: Successfully configured screen share for stream {{streamId}} ({{label}}).
obs.cannotToggleHighlightNotConnected: Cannot toggle highlight: Not connected to OBS.
obs.cannotAddStreamNotConnected: Cannot add stream "{{label}}" ({{id}}) to OBS: Not connected to OBS.
obs.cannotAddStreamNoTargetSceneName: Cannot add stream "{{label}}" ({{id}}): Target OBS scene name is required but not set (no default and no mapping).
obs.highlightedVersionFound: Highlighted version '{{sourceName}}' found for stream {{id}}. This will be managed.
obs.errorCheckingHighlightedSource: Error checking for highlighted source '{{sourceName}}': {{message}}. Will check for base source.
obs.baseVersionFound: Base version '{{sourceName}}' found for stream {{id}}. This will be managed.
obs.errorCheckingBaseSource: Error checking for base source '{{sourceName}}': {{message}}. Will attempt to create.
obs.errorGettingCanvasSize: Error getting OBS canvas size: {{message}}. Using default {{width}}x{{height}}.
obs.managingSource: Managing source '{{sourceName}}' (exists: {{exists}}) for stream "{{label}}" in OBS scene '{{sceneName}}'. URL: {{url}}
obs.willCloneToMainScene: - Will also clone to main scene '{{sceneName}}'.
obs.willSwitchToScene: - Will also switch OBS to scene '{{sceneName}}'.
obs.sourceNotGlobalCreating: Source '{{sourceName}}' does not exist globally. Creating it in scene '{{sceneName}}'.
obs.sourceCreatedAddedToScene: Source '{{sourceName}}' created and added to scene '{{sceneName}}'.
obs.sourceGlobalUpdating: Source '{{sourceName}}' already exists globally. Updating its settings.
obs.sourceFoundAsItemInScene: Source '{{sourceName}}' found as item in scene '{{sceneName}}'.
obs.sourceGlobalNotInSceneAdding: Source '{{sourceName}}' exists globally but not in scene '{{sceneName}}'. Adding it.
obs.attemptingCloneToMain: Attempting to clone source '{{sourceName}}' to main scene '{{sceneName}}'.
obs.sourceExistsInMainScene: Source '{{sourceName}}' already exists as an item in main scene '{{sceneName}}'.
obs.errorCheckingMainSceneBeforeClone: Error checking for '{{sourceName}}' in main scene '{{sceneName}}' before cloning: {{message}}
obs.addingSourceToOtherScene: Adding source '{{sourceName}}' as item to other scene '{{sceneName}}'.
obs.errorAddingCloningToOtherScene: Error adding/cloning source '{{sourceName}}' to other scene '{{sceneName}}': {{message}}
obs.switchingProgramScene: Switching OBS current program scene to '{{sceneName}}'.
obs.successfullyProcessedStream: Successfully processed stream "{{label}}" ({{id}}), effective OBS source: '{{sourceName}}'.
obs.existingScreenShareFound: Existing screen share source '{{sourceName}}' found for stream {{id}}. Associating it.
obs.errorCheckingExistingScreenShare: Error checking for existing screen share source '{{sourceName}}': {{message}}
obs.cannotApplyTransformNoScene: Cannot apply transform for source '{{sourceName}}': Scene name not provided.
obs.errorFetchingItemIdForTransform: Error fetching scene item ID for transform of '{{sourceName}}' in '{{sceneName}}': {{message}}. Cannot apply transform.
obs.autoGridEnabledRearranging: Auto-grid enabled for scene '{{sceneName}}'. Triggering rearrange.
obs.errorApplyingNonGridTransform: Error applying non-grid transform to '{{sourceName}}' (Item ID: {{itemId}}) in '{{sceneName}}': {{message}}
obs.cannotRearrangeStreams: Cannot rearrange streams in scene '{{sceneName}}': OBS not connected, scene name missing, or auto-grid not selected.
obs.rearrangingStreamsAutoGrid: Rearranging VDO.Ninja streams in scene '{{sceneName}}' using autoGrid layout.
obs.canvasSizeErrorRearrange: Canvas size error during rearrange for scene '{{sceneName}}': {{message}}. Using default {{width}}x{{height}}.
obs.successfullyRearrangedSources: Successfully rearranged {{count}} VDO.Ninja sources in scene '{{sceneName}}'.
obs.warningAutoGridNoPosition: Warning: autoGrid sizing mode called without gridPosition. Falling back to 'bestFit'.
obs.cannotRemoveStreamNotConnected: Cannot remove stream {{id}} from OBS: Not connected to OBS.
obs.triggeredRemoval: User or auto-triggered removal of stream '{{id}}' from OBS. Base source: '{{baseName}}', Highlighted: '{{highlightName}}'.
obs.streamHighlightedUnhighlightingBeforeRem: Stream {{id}} is currently highlighted. Unhighlighting before removal.
obs.streamScreenSharingRemoving: Stream {{id}} was actively screen sharing. Initiating screen share removal.
obs.finishedRemovingSourceItems: Finished removing source items for stream {{id}} from specified OBS scenes.
obs.autoGridRearrangeAfterRemove: Auto-grid: Triggering rearrange for scene '{{sceneName}}' after stream removal.
obs.cannotRemoveScreenShareNotConnected: Cannot remove screen share: Not connected to OBS.
obs.attemptingRemoveScreenShareSource: Attempting to fully remove screen share source '{{sourceName}}' from OBS (all scenes and input).
obs.globalInputRemovalFailed: Global input removal for '{{sourceName}}' failed (may be in use or other error): {{message}}
obs.errorScreenShareRemovalProcess: Error during screen share removal process for '{{sourceName}}': {{message}}
obs.errorTryingRemoveSourceItem: Error trying to remove source item '{{sourceName}}' from scene '{{sceneName}}': {{message}}
obs.applyingStandardTransform: Applying standard transform ('{{sizing}}') to VDO.Ninja sources in scene '{{sceneName}}'.
obs.errorApplyingStandardTransform: Error applying standard transform in scene '{{sceneName}}': {{message}}
obs.codecChangedUpdatingSources: Codec changed to: {{codec}}. Updating OBS sources...
obs.codecChangedNotConnected: OBS is not connected. Sources will not be updated with the new codec until reconnection and a new action.
obs.screenShareSourceUpdatedWithUrl: Screen share source '{{sourceName}}' updated with URL: {{url}}
obs.errorUpdatingCodecForScreenShare: Error updating codec for screen share source '{{sourceName}}': {{message}}
obs.codecUpdateComplete: Codec update for OBS sources complete.
